analyzer

Class EntityExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • analyzer.EntityExtractor

  • public class EntityExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    Find Objects (Entities) for a given text. it works either document and sentence level
    Each Extractor only works for single category

    Created by Donghun Shin
    Contact: donghun.shin@sk.com, sindongboy@gmail.com
    Date: 7/1/13
